itemDescription: wife of George Spencer, 4th Duke of Marlborough

wikipedia_page.main: Caroline Spencer, Duchess of Marlborough (13 January 1743 – 26 November 1811), formerly Lady Caroline Russell, was the wife of George Spencer, 4th Duke of Marlborough.

response: * Caroline Spencer, Duchess of Marlborough (née Russell, 1742-1811), wife of the 4th Duke
